description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Total Miner is the most powerful creative voxel sandbox on the Xbox 360. Build epic creations using creative tools like Copy & Paste. Build Component Libraries to use in other worlds, or share online. Use circuitry to bring your maps alive. Level your character with Runescape style skills. Enjoy a Minecraft like survival mode. Add logic into your world with the powerful script language.
